name: Gathering Resources
pages: Setting up a basic sculk transporting system is relatively cheap and requires only few materials such as $(item)iron$(), $(item)gold$() or $(item)redstone$(). However, it also requires some materials that can only be found in the $(thing)Deep Dark$() underground biome, which can be found uncommonly near the bottom of the world.

pages.text: $(item)Deepslate$() can be found anywhere in the world below height 0. It can be obtained with any pickaxe and can be crafted into $(item)Deepslate Bricks$() through a $(thing)Crafting Table$() or a $(thing)Stonecutter$().

The $(item)Sculk$() block is required for most recipes, and is commonly found throughout the Deep Dark biome. It is mined fastest with a $(thing)Hoe$(), but can only be obtained using a tool enchanted with $(thing)Silk Touch$().
The $(item)Sculk Sensor$(), another crafting ingredient required for transporting items, can be found uncommonly inside Sculk patches. Be careful around these sensors to not attract any Wardens!
